attributes.title: Eagle Boy Bronze
attributes.description: The Eagle Boy Bronze is a beautiful piece of artwork created by my father Daniel Jones.

attributes.title: Kaw City, OK, USA
attributes.description: My fathers workshop is located outside Kaw City. It is a rural and private location with only two neighbors. Both of which you cannot see.

attributes.title: Pawhuska, OK, USA
attributes.description: This location, is where the foundry operates that cast my fathers bronze maquette.

attributes.title: Niobrara, Nebraska, USA
attributes.description: This location, is where the Eagle Boy maquette will be displayed. Created by my father and delivered to the Northern Ponca Tribe.

attributes.title: Kaw City, OK, USA to Pawhuska, OK, USA
Pawhuska, OK, USA to Niobrara, Nebraska, USA
